translation.Registration slogan: Enter your personal details and start journey with us
translation.Password placeholder: Least one letter, one digit, and one special character  ! @ # $ % &
translation.Terms of use of the site: Terms of use of the site
translation.Login slogan: To keep connected with us please login with your personal info
translation.Terms of use 1.1: To access the full features of WorkTime, users must complete the registration process, providing accurate and current information.
translation.Terms of use 1.2: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and for all activities occurring under their account.
translation.Terms of use 2.1: WorkTime is intended for personal use in tracking work hours and managing shifts efficiently.
translation.Terms of use 2.2: Users agree not to misuse the service, including but not limited to unauthorized access, interference with the functionality, or any activity that may disrupt the service.
translation.Terms of use 3.1: Users may receive notifications related to their use of WorkTime. These notifications are integral to the functionality of the service.
translation.Terms of use 3.2: Users can manage their notification preferences within the application.
translation.Terms of use 4.1: Users have the right to modify or delete their data through the user account settings.
translation.Terms of use 4.2: WorkTime reserves the right to retain certain data for analytical purposes, ensuring the continued improvement of the service.
translation.Terms of use 5.1: WorkTime employs reasonable security measures to protect user data. Users are encouraged to adopt strong and unique passwords for added security.
translation.Terms of use 5.2: Users must not attempt to circumvent security features or engage in any activity that compromises the integrity of the service.
translation.Terms of use 6.1: Users are expected to conduct themselves responsibly within the WorkTime community.
translation.Terms of use 6.2: Any disruptive or abusive behavior may result in the suspension or termination of the user's account.
translation.Terms of use 7.1: WorkTime uses cookies for authentication and session management purposes.
translation.Terms of use 7.2: Users can manage cookie preferences through their browser settings.
translation.Terms of use 8.1: WorkTime may update these terms periodically. Users will be notified of any significant changes, and continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
translation.Terms of use 9.1: WorkTime reserves the right to terminate or suspend user accounts for violations of these terms or any activity deemed harmful to the community or the service.
translation.Terms of use 10: By using WorkTime, users agree to comply with these terms and conditions. It is recommended to review these terms regularly for any updates.
translation.Privacy policy 1.1: WorkTime collects the following personal information:
translation.Work information: Work-related information, including company name, position, and salary
translation.Privacy policy 2.1: The collected data is used solely for the following purposes:
translation.Privacy policy 2.2: Time tracking of work and shifts
translation.Privacy policy 2.3: Sending notifications related to the site's functionality
translation.Privacy policy 3.1: At present, user data is not shared with any third parties.
translation.Privacy policy 4.1: We implement security measures to protect your personal data. (Include additional details about security measures, e.g., data encryption.)
translation.Privacy policy 5.1: You have the right to modify and delete your personal data through your user account on our website.
translation.Privacy policy 6.1: WorkTime uses cookies only for transmitting the refresh token.
translation.Privacy policy 7.1: The privacy policy may be periodically updated. The latest update is reflected at the top of the document.
translation.Request password message: Once you provide your email address, a password reset email will be sent to your inbox. This email will contain a link that will allow you to reset your password securely.
translation.Changed email 1.1: Enter the new email address you want to use. After making the changes, the system will automatically send an activation email to the new address.
translation.Changed email 1.2: Please ensure the accuracy of the entered email address, as an email with activation instructions will be sent to it. If you don't receive the activation email within a few minutes, check your 'Spam' or 'Junk' folder in your email inbox. Please note that the new email address will not be activated until you confirm it by clicking the link in the activation email. If you encounter any difficulties or have questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
translation.Will you choose your date of birth: Will you choose your date of birth?
translation.What name company: What is the name of the company?
translation.What name of your profession: What is the name of your profession?
translation.Start date for working: Will you choose a start date for working for this company?
translation.Your rate per hour of work: Your rate per hour of work?
translation.Delete profile text: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your profile and all associated data? Please be aware that this action is irreversible, and we will not be able to recover your account and information after deletion. All your personal information, uploaded files, and activity history will be lost forever.
translation.Upload avatar 1.1: The selected file must be in one of the following formats '.jpg .png .gif .webp'. The file must not exceed 8MB.
translation.Name: Name
